https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q8sly1kASxgnOScSfwPgQtlfI69.jpg Like her mother before her, beautiful Sissy wants to be a dancer at the Tropicana, Havana's famous cabaret. But her father, Candido, forbids her to do so because of his ongoing grudge against Armando, his former rival and choreographer at the nightclub. A Paradise Under the Stars
